title: Taking A Stand
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon react to Brian Flores filing a lawsuit alleging racism in hiring practices in the NFL before talking the Tom Brady retiring. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
